apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji depicts a womanâ€™s face with rosy cheeks and a gentle smile, leaning forward with closed lips as if to offer a kiss. The signature Apple treatment gives it a soft, three-dimensional appearance, with subtle shading and smooth gradients that highlight the rounded contours of her face and hair. Its light skin tone evokes a sense of tenderness and affection, commonly used to send a sweet gesture or express fondness in digital conversations.
